text:
Hi all,

I am trying to output a specific value inside a Macro based on the value of a Choice field but for some reason, I canâ€™t evaluate the value inside the Macro.

I can output `{{ masthead }}`  inside the macro no problem it correctly shows the value of the choice field, but as soon as I try to evaluate the label with an if statement, I get nothing back..

My code -

```HTML
src="{{ masthead.img('{{ module.masthead_image }}') }}"
width="{{ masthead.width('{{ module.masthead_image }}') }}"```
```
{%- macro img(masthead) -%}
{%- if masthead == 'mailbox' -%}
<https://f.HubSpotusercontent20.net/hubfs/6595474/Email/Masthead/img_masthead_mailbox.png>
{%- endif -%}
{%- endmacro -%}```
